description: This file serves as the entry point for the app-gateway2 project, primarily initializing and delegating to the server implementation, and setting up process error handlers.

methods.name: anonymous callback for 'unhandledRejection'
methods.description: Handles unhandled promise rejections by logging the error.

methods.name: anonymous callback for 'uncaughtException'
methods.description: Handles uncaught exceptions by logging the error.
